summary: This document contains a summary of account balances and transaction details for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas for the period of June 1 to June 30, 2017. It outlines various debits and credits, including payroll fees and other transactions, indicating the financial activities associated with the account.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the account holder for the business checking account detailed in the document.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, New York, New York 10154
keyFacts: The account balance as of June 1, 2017, was $199,440.37.
The ending balance as of June 30, 2017, was $171,649.65.
Multiple preauthorized debits were made for payroll fees, taxes, and health premiums during June 2017.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors related to electronic and non-electronic funds transfers.
There are mentions of service charges and fees totaling $27.79 for the statement period.
